Text: Let's say you have 500 pages that all have the `content` class and you want them to follow the autosizing `col-xs-6` from bootstrap. You don't want to have to add the `col-xs-6` to all of them individually. Is there a way to add this class as a class within another class (look below) without having to specify every element (such as height, width, @media etc)? .content{ .col-xs-6 { /* load col-xs-6 into .content */ } }
